price: ឱបណ្ដាអ្នកដែលមានជំនឿ. ហេតុអ្វីបានជាពួកអ្នកនិយាយ នូវអ្វីដែលពួកអ្នកមិនធ្វើ?
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لِمَ تَقُولُونَ مَا لَا تَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lima taqūlūna mā lā tafʿalūna
